channel.title: How do i add skillcapes with actual emotes?
channel.description: i have the actual models came with source downlaod and stuff im not shur if ther on their yet? its 317 server how can i check or add these?

item.title: How do i add skillcapes with actual emotes?
item.dc:creator: @thewindman78 thewindman78
item.description:
@thewindman78 wrote:

[quote=“tinyscape, post:4, topic:387320”]I believe he wants to know how he could add the real skill cape emotes for his 317 server. I can’t help as i don’t know anything about 317… :o[/quote] Yea thats what im trying to do but i went through my raw folder searching through my models and i have models of the actual runescape emotes im not exactly shur how you would add the model to your client or if their already in their? i know how to add weapon/armour models cause i put in tons of customs… so the main question is how do i add the skill cape emote models into the animation/gfx library and than make a button or command to use the skillcape emote

Read full topic
